FuncDef:
The source-interface command is used to configure the source IP address of a PCEP session.
The undo source-interface command is used to remove the source IP address of a PCEP session.
By default, the source IP is not configured.
ExtraInfo: The PCEP session is established by default using the MPLS LSR-ID as the source IP address. In some special cases, the MPLS LSR-ID is unreachable. You can configure this command to borrow the IP address of other local interfaces as the source IP address.
